parties.party_name: Walter Alfaro Carrillo aka De La Manuel Carillo-Mercado DEFENDANT

charges.charge_description: 8 USC 1326(a) and (b)(1) ILLEGAL REENTRY AFTER DEPORTATION (1)

Defendant is an alien who is a citizen and national of El Salvador, was found in the United States after being deported and without receiving the express consent of the United States Attorney General or the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security to reapply for admission in violation of Title 8 U.S.C. Section 1326 and Title 6 U.S.C. Sections 202 and 557
